column4: alright I'm going to take a break,  hopefully the dev types will come up with a solution to the kernel / graphics problem by the morning :)
later all, and thanks for the help.
Good Morning.
good morning to you too
do I have to add any repos to APT to install skype?
you can do and I suggest you do - and don't say that it a debian repo it is not it is a skype repo ... >> deb http://download.skype.com/linux/repos/debian/ stable non-free
that comment was for others who jump in and call it a deb repo which it ain't :)
Belutz danke.
np
Belutz, I get an error saying libqu3c102-mt must be >= 3:3.3.3.2  and the one I have is 3:3.3.3-yUbuntu3
Belutz, any suggestions?
, now try >>sudo apt-get install libqt3-mt<<
package libqt3-mt is not avalible, but is referred to by another package...  However the following packages replace it: libqt3c102-mt libqt3c102
feckers in skype upgraded and demand a new file we don't have
apt-cache search  libqt3-mt gave you that correct?
sudo apt-get install libqt3-mt
gave me that.
this is down to skype not building a real .deb in the first place
na I will report the problem to skype - as I need it for some luser calls
can I message you?
sure.
